title: Unable to select any item initially in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item for the first time. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view. This behavior persists even after multiple attempts.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
3. Notice that the focus immediately jumps to the library file node instead of allowing selection of the desired item.
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node instead of allowing selection of the desired item.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
3. Verify that the selected item can be successfully selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
